Name: Fiery Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Water-type moves from damaging Fire-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Fire-type Pokémon.  You can get a Fiery Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Red Silk, a Fire Dust, and a Fiery Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
